title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-3.2 - Accumulation of reserve
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-3.2 - Accumulation of reserve

State Regulations

The amount set aside for painting and decorating
reserves at the end of each calendar quarter shall be equal to one quarter of
the average annual estimate of painting and decorating expenses less the actual
painting and decorating expense incurred during each quarter. However, with
respect to a given fiscal year, the amount set aside for any portion of such
fiscal year shall not exceed the prorated average annual estimate less the
actual expense for such portion of the year. The average annual estimate of
painting and decorating expense shall be in accordance with the operating
budget, as approved by the division. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1647-3.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
